bugs.summary: Integrate the Rust component into the component with basic browsing histrory data
Add Nimbus integration for Content Relevancy
Don't create DOM event for those animation events which don't need to be dispatched
check return value of WebPInitDecBuffer in webp decoder
Specialize calls to native functions with variadic parameters
getScreenCTM returns different answers from other browsers, in the presence of CSS transform on root SVG element (which we seem to double-apply)
Enable ESLint rule mozilla/reject-chromeutils-import on devtools as well
Enable the BackupService initializer on Nightly by default
Enable new search configuration globally for nightly

Perma clang-trunk-stage1 /builds/worker/fetches/llvm-project/llvm/lib/TextAPI/BinaryReader/DylibReader.cpp:467:37: error: no member named 'getCompileUnitForCodeAddress' in 'llvm::DWARFContext'; did you mean 'getCompileUnitForAddress'?
Update types and fix issues from introducing gecko typelibs
